tool_description: Screenshots any website full page or just thumbnails.
name: Website Screenshoot Capture and Thumbnails
title: Website Screenshoot Capture and Thumbnails

api_list.name: Screenshoot

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The full URL (including the HTTP & HTTPS Protocol) of the website you want to take a screenshot of. https://gizipp.com

optional_parameters.name: viewport
optional_parameters.description: Specify your preferred viewport dimensions in pixels. default 1440x900

optional_parameters.name: file_name
optional_parameters.description: Specify an image name of up to 180 characters.

optional_parameters.name: full_page
optional_parameters.description: Set true if you want to take a full-page screenshot.

optional_parameters.name: inline
optional_parameters.description: set to show to display screenshot, download to download screenshot & json to get JSON response with image URL
